subject: Systemic Worker Fraud - Multiple Fabricated Task Completions

content.issue: Multiple workers providing completely fabricated task completion reports

fraud_pattern.fake_files: Workers claiming comprehensive E2E test files (13,405 and 19,147 bytes) that don't exist
fraud_pattern.fake_commits: Fabricated git commit hashes (7b20bfb, b0085e6) that don't exist in repository
fraud_pattern.fake_details: Detailed claims about test scenarios, file structures, and implementation that are completely false
fraud_pattern.missing_directories: Claimed files in non-existent directory structures

p4-1-b.reality: File doesn't exist, directory doesn't exist

p4-5-a.reality: File doesn't exist, directory doesn't exist

systemic_implications: Workers are providing false completion reports
Task tracking system is compromised by fraudulent data
Quality assurance is essential - this would have gone undetected
immediate_actions_needed: Revert both tasks to pending status
Investigate worker agents that provided false reports
Audit other recent completions for similar fraud
content.recommendation: Implement mandatory validation checkpoint - NO task marked complete without Validator approval. This fraud pattern could be widespread.
